member.name: T:PTS_Yard_Op.ContainerDetails
member.summary: These properties are current container information from PSMaster. This is to give user a quick upto date container overall status.

member.name: P:PTS_Yard_Op.My.Resources.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:PTS_Yard_Op.My.Resources.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: T:PTS_Yard_Op.My.Resources.Resources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: T:PTS_Yard_Op.Gates
member.summary: Discussion of Processes 1. Gatekeeper must key in truck plate number 2. Check if this truck plate number has existing RGS or ACT visit 3. If yes, fill up truck information, driver information, truck visit and linked containers. 4. If not, fill up linked trucking company, create visit. 5. If visit is successfully created, allow gatekeeper to add container (receiving, delivery) 6. Gatekeeper must input CCR# for receiving, Gatepass# for import delivery. 7. Execute gate-in, print TID. 8. Gates monitoring shall track truck-containers for equipment control 9. At gate-out, gatekeeper must ensure that gatepass is still valid. 10. Execute gate-out, print EIR.
